entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
